creator: ragaller@apache.org
text:
When a user cuts a document and logs out, the document remains in the clipboard.
The next user logging in must paste this document before a new cut action is
permitted. 

Possible remedies could either be per-user clipboards (maybe complicated) or a
«empty clipboard» admin task (like the force checkin)

creator: andreas@apache.org
text: It should be sufficient to remove all session attributes when a user logs in.
Looking at this again, I cannot reproduce the described behaviour anymore.
creator: ragaller@apache.org
